name: Katta-Strophe
description:
Katta-Strophe What is Katta Strophe?

Katta-Strophe (pronounced Kat-ah-Stroaf) is a puzzle game where you pick up objects and place them somewhere else. It sounds simple, but there's actually a lot more to it...

You are the cat.

Depicted above. 

The 'there's actually more to it' bit.

As stated above, you can pick up and place down objects. BUT, you can only place down an object on it's matching destination tile (the blue ones). If you have an object held (you can only hold one at a time), you can push other objects that have not yet reached their destination, provided the adjacent tile is empty.

Over 10 levels, baby! Play It NOW. DO IT!!!11!1!!

...and that's a fact!
